articles.title: Mysterious Dark Spot on Neptune Detected From Earth for the First Time - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Astronomers using the European Southern Observatory’s Very Large Telescope (VLT) have identified a significant dark spot in Neptune’s atmosphere, with an adjacent smaller bright spot. This marks the first such observation made with a terrestrial telescope. Us…
articles.content:
ByEuropean Southern Observatory (ESO)August 25, 2023
This image shows Neptune observed with the MUSE instrument at ESOs Very Large Telescope (VLT). At each pixel within Neptune, MUSE splits the inco… [+14419 chars]
